p: CTT was carried out by employing a cone calorimeter (FTT2000, Fire Testing Technology, West Sussex, UK) according to ISO5660-1. The dimensions of the sample were 20 × 100 × 100 mm 3, which was enveloped in aluminum foil. FTT2000 provided the external heat flux at 35 kW/m 2 horizontally. Each specimen was detected two times and the average result was obtained.
